org.osmdroid.views.overlay
Class MinimapOverlay

java.lang.Object
  org.osmdroid.views.overlay.Overlay
      org.osmdroid.views.overlay.TilesOverlay
          org.osmdroid.views.overlay.MinimapOverlay
All Implemented Interfaces:
IOverlayMenuProvider, OverlayConstants
public class MinimapOverlay
extends TilesOverlay

Draws a mini-map as an overlay layer. It currently uses its own MapTileProviderBasic or a tile provider supplied to it. Do NOT share a tile provider amongst multiple tile drawing overlays - it will create an under-sized cache.

Author:
Marc Kurtz

Constructor Detail

MinimapOverlay

public MinimapOverlay(android.content.Context pContext,
                      android.os.Handler pTileRequestCompleteHandler,
                      MapTileProviderBase pTileProvider,
                      int pZoomDifference)
Creates a MinimapOverlay with the supplied tile provider. The Handler passed in is typically the same handler being used by the main map. The MapTileProviderBase passed in cannot be the same tile provider used in the TilesOverlay, it must be a new instance.

Parameters:
pContext - a context
tileRequestCompleteHandler - a handler for the tile request complete notifications
pTileProvider - a tile provider

draw

protected void draw(android.graphics.Canvas pC,
                    MapView pOsmv,
                    boolean shadow)
Description copied from class: Overlay
Draw the overlay over the map. This will be called on all active overlays with shadow=true, to lay down the shadow layer, and then again on all overlays with shadow=false. Callers should check isEnabled() before calling draw(). By default, draws nothing.

Overrides:
draw in class TilesOverlay

onSingleTapUp

public boolean onSingleTapUp(android.view.MotionEvent pEvent,
                             MapView pMapView)
Description copied from class: Overlay
By default does nothing (return false). If you handled the Event, return true, otherwise return false. If you returned true none of the following Overlays or the underlying MapView has the chance to handle this event.

Overrides:
onSingleTapUp in class Overlay
